product_name: Lezyne Sport Drive HP Mini Pump - Small
long_description: Lezyne Sport Drive HP mini pump offers great performance and value for your cycling endeavors, all in a compact, easily portable design. Pump barrel and shaft are made of aluminum for lightweight, long-lasting performance; handle and end caps are made of plastic. Flexible hose stows inside pump handle when not needed; Presta- and Schrader-compatible hose provides secure, fast valve engagement. Includes a mounting bracket for easy pump storage while riding; bracket mounts to frame via water bottle bosses. End caps help protect internals from road grit and grime. Lezyne Sport Drive HP mini pump is compatible with Presta and Schrader valves; maximum inflation pressure of 120psi (8.3bar).
short_description: Lezyne Sport Drive HP mini pump offers great performance and value for your cycling endeavors, all in a compact, easily portable design.
